context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Travel recovery strong. AI-powered trip planning. Competing with Airbnb, Expedia.

competitors.name: Expedia Group
competitors.notes: Major OTA competitor with Expedia, Vrbo, Hotels.com

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Travel search and direct booking threatening OTA model

competitors.name: TripAdvisor
competitors.notes: Reviews platform with Viator experiences business

competitors.name: Hopper
competitors.notes: Mobile travel app with fintech products

competitors.name: Hotel Direct Channels
competitors.notes: Hotels driving direct bookings with loyalty and best rate guarantees

competitors.name: Tripadvisor
competitors.notes: Travel guidance platform with booking capabilities
